line1: Pre-market engagement can help you to:
line3: write clearer needs to publish for suppliers
line4: understand how much this work could cost
line5: better understand how long this work could take
title: Do pre-market engagement

events.eventDescription: You can name your project in this section. You can also change who leads the procurement or add more colleagues to your project to help you evaluate suppliers.

eventTask.title: Change who is going to lead the procurement

events.eventDescription: You can choose to enter information online to build your RfI, or upload a document. If you choose to build your RfI online you can write your own questions, include context about your organisation and your procurement, and get more detailed information about what suppliers can offer.

eventTask.title: Choose how to build your RfI

events.eventDescription: Review the information you have entered, confirm which suppliers you want to send it to, set out your timeline (including how long suppliers have to ask questions and when you will respond by), and then publish your RfI.
